Detailed Description

A word API request.

Word requests are comprised of the actual word ('word'), as well as specific subelements of that words' dictionary entry, such as phrases, examples, or related words.

All word element requests will be batched into a single network request to the server, however, each individual element request will be counted against the API access limiter.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithWord: (NSString *)  word
elementRequests: (NSArray *)  elementRequests 

Initialize new word request.

Alternative spelling suggestions will be requested, and the canonical form of word will be automatically selected.

Parameters:
wordThe word to look up.
elementRequestsThe array of word entry elements to be fetched, as a array of WNWordElementRequest instances.

Property Documentation

- (NSArray*) elementRequests [read, assign]

The set of word entry elements to be fetched, as an ordered array of WNWordElementRequest instances.
